data.eml:eml: Designation of a neotype for Enteromiuspallidus (Smith, 1841), an endemic cyprinid minnow from the Cape Fold Ecoregion, South Africa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Martin, Melissa B., Chakona, Albert (2019): Designation of a neotype for Enteromiuspallidus (Smith, 1841), an endemic cyprinid minnow from the Cape Fold Ecoregion, South Africa. ZooKeys 848: 103-118, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.848.32211, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.848.32211
